He was but changed his mind.  Straight Shots changed because Tucson changed=
.  They are somewhat connected to each other like twins.  Lol.  What happen=
s to one usually happens to the other.  Call it a genetic phenomenon.

Perp=
etually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Aug 16, 2011, at 2:24 PM, Sup=
er Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> Heya, :)
> 
> Please guys, =
don't just take on new forms all willy nilly here :) In
> the movie it seem=
ed to be the way, but remember in the Beast Wars
> cartoon it didn't really=
 happen unless something catastrophic
> happened. So for here it is more of=
 a process, usually involving a CR
> chamber or being a new protoform. In e=
ssence you have to be 'reset' to
> protoform status and then you can rescan=
 for a new unit.
> 
> I don't mind folks wanting to change into new forms, =
but once you do
> you are stuck with it for a while unless you are ready to=
 spend some
> down time to do it. Just talk to me first please. It makes th=
ings so
> much easier :)
> 
> Plus wasn't nightshift going for a feline bea=
st mode at one point? I
> don't see beast modes being like clothing that yo=
u can just put on and
> take off. :)
> 
> - Preston
> 

--Apple-Mail-25-205299482

<html><body bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF"><div>He was but changed his mind.  Str=

ed to each other like twins.  Lol.  What happens to one usually h=
appens to the other.  Call it a genetic phenomenon.<br><br>Perpetually=
 on the move and constantly busy. </div><div><br>On Aug 16, 2011, at 2=

    <div =
id=3D"ygrp-text">
      
      
      <p>Heya, :)<br>
<br>
Please guys, don=
't just take on new forms all willy nilly here :) In<br>
the movie it seeme=
d to be the way, but remember in the Beast Wars<br>
cartoon it didn't reall=
y happen unless something catastrophic<br>
happened. So for here it is more=
 of a process, usually involving a CR<br>
chamber or being a new protoform.=
 In essence you have to be 'reset' to<br>
protoform status and then you can=
 rescan for a new unit.<br>
<br>
I don't mind folks wanting to change into =
new forms, but once you do<br>
you are stuck with it for a while unless you=
 are ready to spend some<br>
down time to do it. Just talk to me first plea=
se. It makes things so<br>
much easier :)<br>
<br>
Plus wasn't nightshift g=
oing for a feline beast mode at one point? I<br>
don't see beast modes bein=
g like clothing that you can just put on and<br>
take off. :)<br>
<br>
- Pr=
eston<br>
</p>

    </div>
